column4: Still having probs copying from the home folder, my dir to my home folder is /home/zack/ but on other poeples PC's their username will be diffrent, so how do i get around that?
so far i have this "sudo cp -r /home/user/.mozilla/firefox/* /" but others peoples username's will be diffrent and therfore a diffrent directory, how do i get around this?
copy the .mozilla folder inside the users home dir
